Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV4homeABvpZ.name: home
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV4homeABvpZ.abstract: Returns a Path representing the user’s home directory

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV9extensionS.name: extension
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV9extensionS.abstract: Returns the filename extension of this path.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV6parentABvp.name: parent
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV6parentABvp.abstract: Returns the parent directory for this path.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV8basename13.name: basename(dropExtension:)
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV8basename13.abstract: The basename for the provided file, optionally dropping the file extension.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV8relative2t.name: relative(to:)
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV8relative2t.abstract: Returns a string representing the relative path to base.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV4joinyABxSy.name: join(_:)
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV4joinyABxSy.abstract: Joins a path and a string to produce a new path.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV1loiySbAB_A.abstract: Returns the locale-aware sort order for the two paths.

Structs/Path/Entry.html.name: Entry
Structs/Path/Entry.html.abstract: A file entry from a directory listing.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV5chmodyABSi.name: chmod(_:)
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV5chmodyABSi.abstract: Sets the file’s attributes using UNIX octal notation.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV6deleteyyKF.name: delete()
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV6deleteyyKF.abstract: Deletes the path, recursively if a directory.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV5touchAByKF.name: touch()
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV5touchAByKF.abstract: Creates an empty file at this path.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV15replaceCo.name: replaceContents(with:atomically:encoding:)
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV15replaceCo.abstract: Replaces the contents of the file at this path with the provided string.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV10isWritabl.name: isWritable
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV10isWritabl.abstract: Returns true if the path represents an actual file that is also writable by the current user.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV11isDirecto.name: isDirectory
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV11isDirecto.abstract: Returns true if the path represents an actual directory.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV6isFileSbvp.name: isFile
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV6isFileSbvp.abstract: Returns true if the path represents an actual filesystem entry that is not a directory.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV12isExecuta.name: isExecutable
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV12isExecuta.abstract: Returns true if the path represents an actual file that is also executable by the current user.

Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV6existsSbvp.name: exists
Structs/Path.html#/s:4PathAAV6existsSbvp.abstract: Returns true if the path represents an actual filesystem entry.

Functions.html#/s:4Path1doiyA2AVAC_xtSyR.abstract: Joins a path and a string to produce a new path.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa4PathA2AV5Ent.name: directories
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa4PathA2AV5Ent.abstract: Filters the list of entries to be a list of Paths that are directories.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa4PathA2AV5Ent.name: files(withExtension:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa4PathA2AV5Ent.abstract: Filters the list of entries to be a list of Paths that are files with the specified extension

Extensions/CodingUserInfoKey.html#/s:s17.name: relativePath
Extensions/CodingUserInfoKey.html#/s:s17.abstract: If set paths are encoded as relative to this path.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: init(contentsOf:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Initializes this Data with the contents of the provided path.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS4PathE10cont.name: init(contentsOf:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS4PathE10cont.abstract: Initializes this String with the contents of the provided path.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC4P.name: path(forResource:ofType:)
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC4P.abstract: Returns the path for requested resource in this bundle.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC4P.name: sharedFrameworks
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC4P.abstract: Returns the path for the shared-frameworks directory in this bundle.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC4P.name: resources
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC4P.abstract: Returns the path for the resources directory in this bundle.
